name: Mage in Maze
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2021

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/mage-maze-8

You are a magician in search of an Elder Lost Power, and you are ready to do anything to find it, even if it means risking your life. A rumor is circulating about a temple and scrolls in indescribable language... Would this be a clue for your quest of knowledge? You start your adventure at the entrance of this mystical place. From this point only your sword and your crystals are your allies. May luck and memory be in your favor!

Note : best playable version is the download link below.

Credits :

GAME DESIGN by Anne-Laure Avoine de Lacvivier, Jean D. Bergeron, Anne-Laure Fidalgo, Frederic Normand

PROGRAMMING by Jean D. Bergeron, Anne-Laure Fidalgo, Frederic Normand

LEVEL ART by Anne-Laure Avoine de Lacvivier

SPECIAL CONTENT & VFX Stéphane Lim
